org.shared.net.handler

Interface OobHandler<C extends Connection>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the Connection type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionHandler<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilteredHandler, ClientServerTest.Utf8Handler, SynchronousHandler, TestXmlHandler, XmlHandler

    public interface OobHandler<C extends Connection>
extends ConnectionHandler<C>
    Defines a ConnectionHandler that can react to user-defined OobEvents.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.shared.net.ConnectionHandler

        ConnectionHandler.ClosingType

      Methods

      Future<?> onOob(OobEvent evt)

    • Method Detail

      • onOob

        Future<?> onOob(OobEvent evt)
        On receipt of a user-defined OobEvent.
        Parameters:
        evt - the OobEvent.
        Returns:
        a Future for waiting on completion of out-of-band processing, which may occur asynchronously on another thread.
